reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 526/97: PINE RIDGE MUNICIPAL PLANNING AGENCY
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The council of the following local municipalities shall each appoint one member to the Pine Ridge Municipal Planning Agency:  Township of Alnwick Town of Brighton Township of Brighton Village of Colborne Township of Cramahe Township of Haldimand Township of Hamilton O. Reg. 526/97, s. 1; O. Reg. 42/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The council of the following local municipalities shall each appoint one member to the Pine Ridge Municipal Planning Agency:

Township of Alnwick

Town of Brighton

Township of Brighton

Village of Colborne

Township of Cramahe

Township of Haldimand

Township of Hamilton

O. Reg. 526/97, s. 1; O. Reg. 42/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 526/97, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 526/97, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 526/97, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 526/97, s. 3.
